TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_ami_Heku’, title = Heku’, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Amis]}, url = {https://ami.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heku’} }

S.FORM: Heku' Itiniay i Wufeng Cen no Hsinchu ko Heku' a niyaro', 24 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 59 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 57 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 92%, Saysiyat 3%, Amis 2%.

Heko' Itiniay i Wofeng Cen no Hsincho ko Heko' a niyaro', 24 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 59 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 57 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 2 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Tayal 92%, Saysiyat 3%, Amis 2%.
